Sentencas: Iron-air rechargeable oxide batteries (ROB) comprising solid oxide cells (SOC) as energy converters and Fe/metal-oxide redox couples were characterized using planar SOC stacks.
Titulo: Electrochemical characterization of Fe-air rechargeable oxide battery in planar solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: The charge and discharge of the battery correspond to the operations in the electrolysis and fuel cell modes, respectively, but with a stagnant atmosphere consisting of hydrogen and steam.
Titulo: Electrochemical characterization of Fe-air rechargeable oxide battery in planar solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: A novel method was employed to establish the stagnant atmosphere for battery testing during normal SOC operation without complicated modification to the test bench and stack/battery concept.
Titulo: Electrochemical characterization of Fe-air rechargeable oxide battery in planar solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: Manipulation of the gas compositions during battery operation was not necessary, but the influence of the leakage current from the testing system had to be considered.
Titulo: Electrochemical characterization of Fe-air rechargeable oxide battery in planar solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: Batteries incorporating Fe2O3/8YSZ, Fe2O3/CaO and Fe2O3/ZrO2 storage materials were characterized at 800 degrees C. A maximum charge capacity of 30.4 Ah per layer (with an 80 cm(2) active cell area) with-0.5
Titulo: Electrochemical characterization of Fe-air rechargeable oxide battery in planar solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: mol Fe was reached with a current of 12 A.
Titulo: Electrochemical characterization of Fe-air rechargeable oxide battery in planar solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: The charge capacity lost 11% after -130 ROB cycles due to the increased agglomeration of active materials and formation of a dense oxide layer on the surface.
Titulo: Electrochemical characterization of Fe-air rechargeable oxide battery in planar solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: The round trip efficiencies of the tested batteries were <= 84% due to the large internal resistance.
Titulo: Electrochemical characterization of Fe-air rechargeable oxide battery in planar solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: With state-of-the-art cells, the round trip efficiency can be further improved.
Titulo: Electrochemical characterization of Fe-air rechargeable oxide battery in planar solid oxide cell stacks
